// GeneralTab.js import React, { useState } from 'react'; const GeneralTab = ({ profile, formData, handleChange, handleSubmit, isEditing, setIsEditing }) => (

General Information

{isEditing ? (
{/* Input fields */}
{/* Rest of the form fields */} {/* Submit buttons */}
) : (

Name: {profile.user.name}

Email: {profile.user.email}

{/* Display other fields */}
)}
); export default GeneralTab;
